short_summary: Purchasing a trailer mounted sewer cleaner with an inspection camera for delivery to Canadian Armed Forces Base Cold Lake, AB.
description: The Contracting Authority has a requirement to acquire one (1) Trailer Mounted Sewer Cleaner with Inspection Camera. The requested delivery date is 120 days.
duration_in_months: The requested delivery date is 120 days.
full_summary:
### Trailer Mounted Sewer Cleaner with Inspection Camera

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of one (1) Trailer Mounted Sewer Cleaner with Inspection Camera. The delivered contract is estimated to be completed within 120 days.

#### Delivery

The equipment will be delivered to the Canadian Armed Forces Base Cold Lake, Alberta.

#### Languages

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Submission of Proposals

Submissions must be submitted by email to [DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessouissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessouissions@forces.gc.ca). Proposers must review the electronic submission of bids section in the solicitation document.

#### Solicitation Documents

All solicitation documents, including this notice, are available on the Canada Buys website.

#### Sourcing

DND adheres to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
- Lee, Wo il
- Email: [woil.lee@forces.gc.ca](mailto:woil.lee@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: N/A
- Address: 45 blvd Sacre Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 1C6

#### Trade Agreements 

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Notice Background

DND initially issued a bidding notice, the bid closing date has been extended several times. Sir, you can find all amendments and documentation under the table “procurement documents” in Canada Buys.

#### Documentation

Documentation may be accessed at the following links:
- <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/24/27db7
